name: Brace Yourself
description:
1 - A kid, a dentist and a narrator walk into a bar ... What could possibly happen? 
Shape your path and choose between order or chaos. 
And don't forget to Brace Yourself. 

2 - Brace Yourself is an interactive fiction IN WHICH every path leads you to a different scenario. 
Don't take it personally and leave the logic behind! 
Please rate and leave a comment if you enjoy.  

3 - Content Warnings: 
- Butts;
- Bad internet humor;
- Strong Language. 

4 - Credits: 
Writing by Anxhela Agushi, Cristiano Recalcati, Davide Corallo e Riccardo Reina 

5 - Note:  
We recomend you to play the game on one of the following browsers: Microsoft Edge, Google Chrome or Mozilla Firefox
